task_8.name: Eighth Task
task_8.description:
This is a description for task 8! This is the eighth task I've made, and I can't believe it's taken all the way until now to create a good looking description for this task. Sometimes tasks will have looooonnnng descriptions!

- Maybe Tasks will have formatted instructions?
- Maybe They wont...
- - Maybe they'll have sub-instructions
- - Maybe they wont....

Either way, tasks can have BIG descriptions. All duties can, and I need to be sure that they are able to be accomadated!

task_9.description: Maybe another long description for this - maybe not??? Who knows?! This is for diagnosis.
